channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down Britain's longest river, the Severn - once a river of division and conflict, now one of connection.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Roo Irvine, Gary Barton and Kevin Paxton head to St Andrews.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: British Gardens in Time
channel.desc: Series exploring four iconic gardens looks at Great Dixter, which lays claim to being the most innovative, spectacular and provocative garden of the 20th century.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston visit and compete in country shows. The chefs are in Hawkshead - famous for being home to Beatrix Potter.

channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down Britain's longest river, the Severn - once a river of division and conflict, now one of connection.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Ruaridh Lever-Hogg meets Melissa, and they paint. Nadeem and Mia face a challenge. Plus comedy sketch, VV and Magic's tricks.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Tom Gaisford's film follows a gay trans man stepping into the ring for a boxing fight. This knockout documentary gives you a ringside seat to a situation gaining notoriety.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team head to Banbury to surprise young carers who help look after their mother, and transform their indoor and outdoor spaces.

channel.title: Sex Secrets
channel.desc: Lockdown wreaked havoc on our sex lives.some went without and some got naughty. Anna Richardson dives under the covers to investigate.

channel.desc: Ruaridh Lever-Hogg meets Melissa, and they paint. Nadeem and Mia face a challenge. Plus comedy sketch, VV and Magic's tricks.

channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.
